activities: CitizenGlobal is a B2B website which creates Web and Facebook applications that enable our customers (businesses and organizations) to make callout requests to Web and Facebook users to come to the app and browse, watch or view media files, register, submit their video, audio, or image files, and share with their friends via email, Facebook, Twitter and other social media networks.
contactoff1: 5800A Hannum Ave. Suite 210, Culver City, CA, 90230
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Computer Software - (CSF)Advertising Services - (ADV)Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)
personaldata: The personal data CG collects as part of the process of running our B2B business comes from Web and Facebook users. The data is entered into a web form by a user and is processed via computer, it is not manually processed by CitizenGlobal.
recoursemech: CitizenGlobal elects to satisfy this requirement by committing to comply with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC). We will cooperate with the DPAs and FDPIC in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor. And we will comply with any advice given by the DPAs and FDPIC.
